name: ORBIO
description: Pikamoon is set in a magical fantasy world that offers players two core experiences: a fast-paced Battle Royale and an expansive Open-World adventure. Players face rivals, battle wild Pikamoon, and build their own collection of creatures, each with unique abilities and traits. Through Web3 integration, every Pikamoon and in-game asset can be owned forever, giving players more than the time they invest in gaming.
